SELECT SC_CODENM AS CONTENT , NVL(COUNT,0) AS COUNT FROM S_COMMON_CODE_SUB CB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(STM_REGDT, 'HH24') TIME , COUNT(*) COUNT FROM (
) A GROUP BY TO_CHAR(STM_REGDT, 'HH24') ORDER BY TIME ) B ON CB.SC_CODENM = B.TIME WHERE SC_MC_IN_C = 'AS'
ORDER BY COUNT DESC
ORDER BY SC_CODELV

SELECT SC_CODENM AS CONTENT , NVL(COUNT,0) AS COUNT FROM S_COMMON_CODE_SUB CB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(STM_REGDT,'dy') AS DAYOFWEEK , COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM (
) A GROUP BY TO_CHAR(STM_REGDT,'dy') ORDER BY 1 ) B ON CB.SC_CODENM = B.DAYOFWEEK WHERE SC_MC_IN_C = 'AR'
ORDER BY COUNT DESC
ORDER BY SC_CODELV

ORDER BY CONTENT
